message: Hi Bob, I've got a great product for you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, $200 is too high for me. I can get a similar product from another seller for $80. I would be willing to pay $60 for your product.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I can't go down to $60, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $180?

I appreciate you coming down in price, Alice, but $180 is still much higher than what I can pay. I want to be transparent - I have another seller offering the same product for $80. I can go up to $70 for your product, but anything higher than that and I'll need to go with the other seller.
